data.title: We Belong Here: Central Park
data.meta_description: Fisher, Kaskade & Monolink | October 4-6 2024 | New York City’s dance music festival combines global tunes with local vibes.
data.text:
Tickets on sale now

THE EXPERIENCE

New York City’s dance music festival combines global tunes with local vibes, offering a top-tier experience for world travelers and city locals alike.

The festival is all ages, however ticket holders under the age of 21 must be accompanied by a ticket holding legal guardian.

THE MUSIC

FRIDAY, OCTOBER 4

MONOLINK

Follow

Follow

Follow

Follow

SATURDAY, OCTOBER 5

KASKADE

Follow

Follow

Follow

Follow

SUNDAY, OCTOBER 6

FISHER

Follow

Follow

Follow

Follow

THE LOCATION

WOLLMAN RINK IN CENTRAL PARK

The iconic Wollman Rink located in Central Park with sweeping views of the Manhattan skyline

We’re turning the ice rink into a massive dance floor with immersive production at the core

MEET US HERE

40.76851, -73.97442

GETTING THERE

RIDESHARE

We highly recommend utilizing rideshare. We will offer a dedicated rideshare pickup and drop-off point and provide here a bit closer to the festival.

SUBWAY

59th Street-Columbus Circle (A, B, C, D, 1 trains): From here, you can enter Central Park at the southwest corner and walk east to Wollman Rink.

57th Street-7th Avenue (N, Q, R, W trains): This stop leaves you near the southeastern corner of Central Park. Walk north into the park and follow signs to Wollman Rink.

Fifth Avenue/59th Street (N, R, W trains): This stop is at the southeastern corner of Central Park. Enter the park and head west to reach Wollman Rink.

PARKING

No parking exists at the venue. If you are still looking to drive, we suggest finding private parking near 5th Ave and E 66th St, or along W 59th St.

GETTING HOME

Following the festival each day, we will direct all attendees along the same exit route leading to the Southern edge of Central Park at W 59th St., so plan your travel home accordingly.

THE FOOD

At We Belong Here, great food is central to the experience. Come hungry and explore a curated selection of global flavors from local restaurants and vendors.

*Photos shown are from past We Belong Here experiences and may not be indicative of what will be available

FOOD LINE-UP TO BE

ANNOUNCED

Vegan, vegetarian, and gluten-free options will be available

TICKETS & TABLES

Find the package for the perfect weekend.

Prices include all fees

GOLD ADMISSION

SINGLE DAY

$104.99

FULL WEEKEND

$289.88

VIEW PERKS

Enjoy admission at any time including:

Access to oversized dance floor where every spot has great sound, views and room to danc

Access to the Gold Lawn area featuring shade, seating, lawn games and complimentary filtered water

Access to premium food and beverage for additional purchase

Access to air conditioned restrooms

GOLD ADMISSION (EARLY ARRIVAL)

SINGLE DAY

$81.88

FULL WEEKEND

$220.54

VIEW PERKS

Enjoy admission within the first hour of the event including:

Access to oversized dance floor where every spot has great sound, views and room to dance

Access to the Gold Lawn area featuring shade, seating, lawn games and complimentary filtered water

Access to premium food and beverage for additional purchase

Access to air conditioned restrooms

*A $40 surcharge will be applied for late arrival

PLATINUM ADMISSION

SINGLE DAY

$197.43

FULL WEEKEND

$578.77

VIEW PERKS

Enjoy admission at any time with the highest level of access and ammenities including:

Access to backstage Platinum dance floor area with private bar

Access to the Platinum Lounge featuring tented shade, complimentary light snacks, massage devices and more

Access to Platinum express entry line Access to addtional private Platinum restrooms

Access to all perks of Gold Admission

TABLE RESERVATIONS

Table reservations can be made on a per day basis, for groups of up to 10 per table.

Availability is highly limited.
